title: Project
text:
One of the projects I’ve worked on is a website on being was titled Software Solutions. With our application, customers can easily start, manage, and stop their software plans, as well as take care of payments all in one spot.



The main objectives of the project were:

Objective 1: Simplify the process of managing software subscriptions
Objective 2: Minimise the effort users need to spend on tracking multiple subscriptions
Objective 3: Help users to make better decisions about adjusting their software needs




To achieve the objectives, the following methodology was adopted:

Research: Conducted extensive literature review to understand the different softwares available online.
Design and Development: Designed and developed a prototype website using Figma and did its UI
Testing: Implemented various testing methods to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the project outcomes.




Some of the key features of the project include:

Feature 1: A user side for users to purchase softwares
Feature 2: An admin side for admins to perform adding or removing of platforms and more
Feature 3: A PHP Mailer feature for users to receive conformations upon purchase







Database Overview






Landing Page:




Landing Page 1



User Details :




User Details Page



Admin Details:




Admin Page





In conclusion, our team has successfully created a fully functional website that delivers all of our objectives listed at the top. Our web application significantly eases the management of software subscriptions through an intuitive and secure website with working front end as well back end.
